example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3MS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يذكر) (SBAR-SBJ-1 (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-2 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_ACC الطرفين)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P أعلنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-TMP (NOUN لدى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN إطلاق) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المفاوضات))) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN كانون) (DET+ADJ_NUM الثاني))))) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC نيت) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3D هما)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التوصل)) (PP (PREP إلى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اتفاق)))) (PP-TMP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حلول) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN حزيران)))))))))) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to reach to an agreement by June
